channel.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LAcVS.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/DHXUh.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/LAcVS.png[/img][/center]
Rune legends is based off of rs2-474 created by Scu11 & Vastico, based off of hyperion which is created by Graham. We've worked countless hours on this server to make it one of the most advanced RuneScape private servers out there. Here at RuneLegends, you'll experience realistic close to perfect combat, amazing minigames to obtain items and so on. We have the most advanced PvP & PvN combat out there, there's no over powered weapons or monsters in the game. They're the exact same as RuneScape's back in 2007. That's enough of the introduction so lets get started! [center]
[b]Developers[/b]
Santa & Killamess
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QnNZG.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/JNmZL.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/QnNZG.png[/img]
[b][size=4][url=http://www.runelegends.org] Official Website Click Here[/url]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/vcq7uw.png[/img][/center] [b][size=4][LEFT]NPC'S FEATURES[/LEFT]
NPC Defence System NPC Clipping Npc Following Npc Dialogues SQL Supported NPC Freezing NPC Cannot walk ontop of each other NPC Smart Path finding
[center][img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2elbna1.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]NPC BOSSES[/LEFT]
General Graardor - With all the correct animations and delays, Graphics. as-well with his minions K'ril Tsutsaroth - With all the correct animations and graphics and the correct effects as RuneScape as-well with the demon minions Kree'arra- With all the correct animations and graphics, and you cannot use melee weapons against this boss. as-well with the minions Commander Zilyana- With all the correct animations and graphics and effects as-well with her minions Chaos Elemental - With all the correct attacks and the monster will teleport you to random locations in the wilderness and disarm you from combat. Dagannoth Kings - All their effects work properly and they all have the correct animations King Black Dragon - With all the correct attacks and animations and fire breating, anti dragon shields and dfs works against this monster
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wTh8S.png[/img][/center] [b][size=4][LEFT]Thieving[/LEFT]
Thieving from stalls Thieving from npcs
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cu19r.png[/img] [/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Slayer[/LEFT]
Slayer Master Slayer Monsters Slayer Tasks
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/osXCG.png[/img][/center] [b][size=4][LEFT]RuneCrafting[/LEFT]
All Altars works perfectly All pouches work Runes Multiple depending on what level you are RuneCrafting gives you exp Abyss Tailsman - Not Started
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QvkIY.png[/img][/center] [b][size=4][LEFT]Crafting[/LEFT]
Gem cutting Leather - not started Dragonhide - not started
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/1y8Z3.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Mining[/LEFT]
Correct Mining delays Correct Pickaxe Requirements Scans for the best pick axe in the inventory Pickaxe are useable in the inventory.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/kbbDe.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Smelting[/LEFT]
Smelting All ores into bars Correct level requirements Possibility to smelt two ores depending on your level
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Rdj5r.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Fletching[/LEFT]
Bolt Tip Making Onyx Bolts Dragon Bolts Diamond Bolts Ruby Bolts Emerald Bolts Sapphire Bolts Topaz Bolts Jade Bolts Pearl Bolts Opal Bolts
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/NirJ1.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Prayer[/LEFT]
Bone Burying Bone on Altars Correct prayer draining Glitch with the protection prayers, fixed now.
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/S3GK9.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Magic[/LEFT]
Correct Graphics Correct Delays Perfect Rushing Perfect Freezing Timers All Modern Spells All Ancient Spells Vengeance & Vengeance Other Clipped Projectiles
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/6S0pG.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Range[/LEFT]
Correct Delays Correct Projectiles Clipped Projectiles Specials Bolts Clipped Cannon Balls
[center][img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120221055805/runescape/images/8/8b/Strength.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Melee[/LEFT]
Perfect Weapon Timers Perfect Combat Formula Clipped Following No Diagonal Attacks Correct Delays
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BTosl.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=4][LEFT]Defence[/LEFT]
Accurate Defence System Near Perfect Correct Blocking Animations Correct Equipment bonuses Correct Equipment Requirements
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/KAM4r.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/gYrH3.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/KAM4r.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/shiptravel.png[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/firemaking.png[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/fletching.png[/img]
[b]RFD Started[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tgMum.png[/img]
[b]Camelot table training completed[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/x4xwA.png[/img]
More Media
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w38gM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/muyPd.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NFtYgK2_uxg[/youtube] [img]http://i.imgur.com/kJx86.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Uqe6F.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rSvdH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8Pqfa.png[/img]
[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img] [img]http://imgur.com/RVzsD.png[/img][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img][/center]
3/10/2012 [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ly0CeWHloJA[/youtube]
3/7/2012-3/9/2012 Most fishing spots are added Fishing is added Weapon sounds are added
3/6/2012 Bolt Tip Making Onyx Bolts Dragon Bolts Diamond Bolts Ruby Bolts Emerald Bolts Sapphire Bolts Topaz Bolts Jade Bolts Pearl Bolts Opal Bolts
3/4/2012 Sailing is done Farming base has been added Slayer has been updated a bit. Knight Waves are completed & bug free afawk
3/3/2012 All Obsidian weapons are completed.
2/23/2012-2/27/2012 Knight waves are completed Recipe for disaster is completed Starting Lunar as we speak.
2/22/2012 - 22/2/2012 Completed a Knight Waves base all that is left to do is implant the npcs and make them workable with the base, and some other misc things.
2-19-2012 Chaos elemental drops are done. Ring of dueling works Games necklace works Path finding for npcs are re-done
2/17/2012-2/18/2012 All normal and ancient teleports. Vengeance will stop resetting your attack when you cast it. 90% multi zone areas are now added. More Npc drops have been added for cows, chickens, rock crabs, moss giants, men, dragons, hill giants, and women
2/16/2012- Teleport tabs completed Teleports are completed
2/14/2012- Cannon is completed Abyss has been started Cannon is complete and re-done. Smelting is completed
2/13/2012- Added a video of clipped projectiles for cannon. Cannon Fixes RuneCrafting - With pouches. //TODO Abyss. 2/12/2012 - Clipped Projectiles have been added Clipped Cannon balls - Cannon is 100% completed now Dragon Long Special Added - Special Void Added Barrel Chest Anchor Added Dragon Mace Added - Special 1 Cannon Per person
Credits Credits to everyone that has worked on this base/hyperion Credits Jimmy & Jesse, for Mage arena, Barrows

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Pvp 508, post:76, topic:433013”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=535733.msg3943760#msg3943760 date=1331662945]
if u add reveanant hunting worlds ill be on ur server everyday
[/quote]

Revs weren’t added in 474’s it was added when the wild was removed which was in 484 iirc?[/quote]

December 10, 2007

Read full topic

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:62, topic:433013”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=535733.msg3932852#msg3932852 date=1330823670]
It would be an improvement the same way project insanity was an improvement to deltascape.

I also noticed that most of the skills in Project Insanity were all handled the same way, so maybe if you programmed the skills in a nice and efficient way, people would learn from that and start duplicating that for more content instead. I guess what I am saying is that people will copy paste better programmed content and then change the values for whatever they are doing.
[/quote]

People could also rip from project insanity and put it in this source.[/quote]

They would.

Read full topic

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

It would be an improvement the same way project insanity was an improvement to deltascape.

I also noticed that most of the skills in Project Insanity were all handled the same way, so maybe if you programmed the skills in a nice and efficient way, people would learn from that and start duplicating that for more content instead. I guess what I am saying is that people will copy paste better programmed content and then change the values for whatever they are doing.

Read full topic
item.source: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:59, topic:433013”][quote author=Pvp 508 link=topic=535733.msg3932599#msg3932599 date=1330812380]
No it wouldn’t, We wouldn’t release anything to benefit the community due to the fact people would just download it and host it for profit without giving the correct credits to whom made it. Look at the Project Insanity era, but if you really want to help out the community you could download the original base and update it and feed it to the community
[/quote]
I’d rather see this hosted and leeched than Project Insanity.[/quote]

No you wouldn’t, Reason being is… This would turn into shit due to people releasing shitty tutorials just like they did with Deltascape/Project insanity.

Read full topic
item.source: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Pvp 508:

No it wouldn’t, We wouldn’t release anything to benefit the community due to the fact people would just download it and host it for profit without giving the correct credits to whom made it. Look at the Project Insanity era, but if you really want to help out the community you could download the original base and update it and feed it to the community

I’d rather see this hosted and leeched than Project Insanity.

Read full topic

item.title: RS2007 Bringing back the glory days [RuneLegends]
item.dc:creator: @Pvp_508 Pvp 508
item.description:
@Pvp_508 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:57, topic:433013”][quote author=Pvp 508 link=topic=535733.msg3931954#msg3931954 date=1330743532]
This won’t be released
[/quote]

O well, I guess it is your work so you have every right to do whatever you want with it. It would benefit the private server community if you did release it.[/quote]

No it wouldn’t, We wouldn’t release anything to benefit the community due to the fact people would just download it and host it for profit without giving the correct credits to whom made it. Look at the Project Insanity era, but if you really want to help out the community you could download the original base and update it and feed it to the community

Read full topic
